scripts.build: npm run build -w @mh-os/shared && npm run build -w mh-os-superapp-backend && npm run build -w mh-os-admin
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf packages/shared/node_modules && rimraf apps/back-end/node_modules && rimraf apps/front-end/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w mh-os-superapp-backend && npm run lint -w mh-os-admin
scripts.migrate:deploy: cd apps/back-end && npx prisma migrate deploy
